oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elizabeth Schardt in front of Schardt Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Elizabeth Schardt (center) in front of Schardt Hall in April 1964
Elizabeth Burke Schardt taught foreign languages at the institution from 1918-1962.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schardt, Elizabeth Burke; College teachers; College buildings; Middle Tennessee State College
